66011001 I was given a reed like a measuring rod and was told, “Go and measure the temple of God and the altar, with its worshipers.
66011002 But exclude the outer court; do not measure it, because it has been given to the Gentiles. They will trample on the holy city for 42 months.
66011003 And I will appoint my two witnesses, and they will prophesy for 1,260 days, clothed in sackcloth.”
66011004 They are “the two olive trees” and the two lampstands, and “they stand before the Lord of the earth.”
66011005 If anyone tries to harm them, fire comes from their mouths and devours their enemies. This is how anyone who wants to harm them must die.
66011006 They have power to shut up the heavens so that it will not rain during the time they are prophesying; and they have power to turn the waters into blood and to strike the earth with every kind of plague as often as they want.
66011007 Now when they have finished their testimony, the beast that comes up from the Abyss will attack them, and overpower and kill them.
66011008 Their bodies will lie in the public square of the great city—which is figuratively called Sodom and Egypt—where also their Lord was crucified.
66011009 For three and a half days some from every people, tribe, language and nation will gaze on their bodies and refuse them burial.
66011010 The inhabitants of the earth will gloat over them and will celebrate by sending each other gifts, because these two prophets had tormented those who live on the earth.
66011011 But after the three and a half days the breath of life from God entered them, and they stood on their feet, and terror struck those who saw them.
66011012 Then they heard a loud voice from heaven saying to them, “Come up here.” And they went up to heaven in a cloud, while their enemies looked on.
66011013 At that very hour there was a severe earthquake and a tenth of the city collapsed. Seven thousand people were killed in the earthquake, and the survivors were terrified and gave glory to the God of heaven.
66011014 The second woe has passed; the third woe is coming soon.
66011015 The seventh angel sounded his trumpet, and there were loud voices in heaven, which said: “The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and of his Messiah, and he will reign for ever and ever.”
66011016 And the twenty-four elders, who were seated on their thrones before God, fell on their faces and worshiped God,
66011017 saying: “We give thanks to you, Lord God Almighty, the One who is and who was, because you have taken your great power and have begun to reign.
66011018 The nations were angry, and your wrath has come. The time has come for judging the dead, and for rewarding your servants the prophets and your people who revere your name, both great and small— and for destroying those who destroy the earth.”
66011019 Then God’s temple in heaven was opened, and within his temple was seen the ark of his covenant. And there came flashes of lightning, rumblings, peals of thunder, an earthquake and a severe hailstorm.
66012001 A great sign appeared in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, with the moon under her feet and a crown of twelve stars on her head.
66012002 She was pregnant and cried out in pain as she was about to give birth.
66012003 Then another sign appeared in heaven: an enormous red dragon with seven heads and ten horns and seven crowns on its heads.
66012004 Its tail swept a third of the stars out of the sky and flung them to the earth. The dragon stood in front of the woman who was about to give birth, so that it might devour her child the moment he was born.
66012005 She gave birth to a son, a male child, who “will rule all the nations with an iron scepter.” And her child was snatched up to God and to his throne.
66012006 The woman fled into the wilderness to a place prepared for her by God, where she might be taken care of for 1,260 days.
66012007 Then war broke out in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and his angels fought back.
66012008 But he was not strong enough, and they lost their place in heaven.
66012009 The great dragon was hurled down—that ancient serpent called the devil, or Satan, who leads the whole world astray. He was hurled to the earth, and his angels with him.
66012010 Then I heard a loud voice in heaven say: “Now have come the salvation and the power and the kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Messiah. For the accuser of our brothers and sisters, who accuses them before our God day and night, has been hurled down.
66012011 They triumphed over him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony; they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death.
66012012 Therefore rejoice, you heavens and you who dwell in them! But woe to the earth and the sea, because the devil has gone down to you! He is filled with fury, because he knows that his time is short.”
66012013 When the dragon saw that he had been hurled to the earth, he pursued the woman who had given birth to the male child.
66012014 The woman was given the two wings of a great eagle, so that she might fly to the place prepared for her in the wilderness, where she would be taken care of for a time, times and half a time, out of the serpent’s reach.
66012015 Then from his mouth the serpent spewed water like a river, to overtake the woman and sweep her away with the torrent.
66012016 But the earth helped the woman by opening its mouth and swallowing the river that the dragon had spewed out of his mouth.
66012017 Then the dragon was enraged at the woman and went off to wage war against the rest of her offspring—those who keep God’s commands and hold fast their testimony about Jesus.
66013001 The dragon stood on the shore of the sea. And I saw a beast coming out of the sea. It had ten horns and seven heads, with ten crowns on its horns, and on each head a blasphemous name.
66013002 The beast I saw resembled a leopard, but had feet like those of a bear and a mouth like that of a lion. The dragon gave the beast his power and his throne and great authority.
66013003 One of the heads of the beast seemed to have had a fatal wound, but the fatal wound had been healed. The whole world was filled with wonder and followed the beast.
66013004 People worshiped the dragon because he had given authority to the beast, and they also worshiped the beast and asked, “Who is like the beast? Who can wage war against it?”
66013005 The beast was given a mouth to utter proud words and blasphemies and to exercise its authority for forty-two months.
66013006 It opened its mouth to blaspheme God, and to slander his name and his dwelling place and those who live in heaven.
66013007 It was given power to wage war against God’s holy people and to conquer them. And it was given authority over every tribe, people, language and nation.
66013008 All inhabitants of the earth will worship the beast—all whose names have not been written in the Lamb’s book of life, the Lamb who was slain from the creation of the world.
66013009 Whoever has ears, let them hear.
66013010 “If anyone is to go into captivity, into captivity they will go. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, with the sword they will be killed.” This calls for patient endurance and faithfulness on the part of God’s people.
66013011 Then I saw a second beast, coming out of the earth. It had two horns like a lamb, but it spoke like a dragon.
66013012 It exercised all the authority of the first beast on its behalf, and made the earth and its inhabitants worship the first beast, whose fatal wound had been healed.
66013013 And it performed great signs, even causing fire to come down from heaven to the earth in full view of the people.
66013014 Because of the signs it was given power to perform on behalf of the first beast, it deceived the inhabitants of the earth. It ordered them to set up an image in honor of the beast who was wounded by the sword and yet lived.
66013015 The second beast was given power to give breath to the image of the first beast, so that the image could speak and cause all who refused to worship the image to be killed.
66013016 It also forced all people, great and small, rich and poor, free and slave, to receive a mark on their right hands or on their foreheads,
66013017 so that they could not buy or sell unless they had the mark, which is the name of the beast or the number of its name.
66013018 This calls for wisdom. Let the person who has insight calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. That number is 666.
66014001 Then I looked, and there before me was the Lamb, standing on Mount Zion, and with him 144,000 who had his name and his Father’s name written on their foreheads.
66014002 And I heard a sound from heaven like the roar of rushing waters and like a loud peal of thunder. The sound I heard was like that of harpists playing their harps.
66014003 And they sang a new song before the throne and before the four living creatures and the elders. No one could learn the song except the 144,000 who had been redeemed from the earth.
66014004 These are those who did not defile themselves with women, for they remained virgins. They follow the Lamb wherever he goes. They were purchased from among mankind and offered as firstfruits to God and the Lamb.
66014005 No lie was found in their mouths; they are blameless.
66014006 Then I saw another angel flying in midair, and he had the eternal gospel to proclaim to those who live on the earth—to every nation, tribe, language and people.
66014007 He said in a loud voice, “Fear God and give him glory, because the hour of his judgment has come. Worship him who made the heavens, the earth, the sea and the springs of water.”
66014008 A second angel followed and said, “ ‘Fallen! Fallen is Babylon the Great,’ which made all the nations drink the maddening wine of her adulteries.”
66014009 A third angel followed them and said in a loud voice: “If anyone worships the beast and its image and receives its mark on their forehead or on their hand,
66014010 they, too, will drink the wine of God’s fury, which has been poured full strength into the cup of his wrath. They will be tormented with burning sulfur in the presence of the holy angels and of the Lamb.
66014011 And the smoke of their torment will rise for ever and ever. There will be no rest day or night for those who worship the beast and its image, or for anyone who receives the mark of its name.”
66014012 This calls for patient endurance on the part of the people of God who keep his commands and remain faithful to Jesus.
66014013 Then I heard a voice from heaven say, “Write this: Blessed are the dead who die in the Lord from now on.” “Yes,” says the Spirit, “they will rest from their labor, for their deeds will follow them.”
66014014 I looked, and there before me was a white cloud, and seated on the cloud was one like a son of man with a crown of gold on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.
66014015 Then another angel came out of the temple and called in a loud voice to him who was sitting on the cloud, “Take your sickle and reap, because the time to reap has come, for the harvest of the earth is ripe.”
66014016 So he who was seated on the cloud swung his sickle over the earth, and the earth was harvested.
66014017 Another angel came out of the temple in heaven, and he too had a sharp sickle.
66014018 Still another angel, who had charge of the fire, came from the altar and called in a loud voice to him who had the sharp sickle, “Take your sharp sickle and gather the clusters of grapes from the earth’s vine, because its grapes are ripe.”
66014019 The angel swung his sickle on the earth, gathered its grapes and threw them into the great winepress of God’s wrath.
66014020 They were trampled in the winepress outside the city, and blood flowed out of the press, rising as high as the horses’ bridles for a distance of 1,600 stadia.
66015001 I saw in heaven another great and marvelous sign: seven angels with the seven last plagues—last, because with them God’s wrath is completed.
66015002 And I saw what looked like a sea of glass glowing with fire and, standing beside the sea, those who had been victorious over the beast and its image and over the number of its name. They held harps given them by God
66015003 and sang the song of God’s servant Moses and of the Lamb: “Great and marvelous are your deeds, Lord God Almighty. Just and true are your ways, King of the nations.
66015004 Who will not fear you, Lord, and bring glory to your name? For you alone are holy. All nations will come and worship before you, for your righteous acts have been revealed.”
66015005 After this I looked, and I saw in heaven the temple—that is, the tabernacle of the covenant law—and it was opened.
66015006 Out of the temple came the seven angels with the seven plagues. They were dressed in clean, shining linen and wore golden sashes around their chests.
66015007 Then one of the four living creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden bowls filled with the wrath of God, who lives for ever and ever.
66015008 And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God and from his power, and no one could enter the temple until the seven plagues of the seven angels were completed.
66016001 Then I heard a loud voice from the temple saying to the seven angels, “Go, pour out the seven bowls of God’s wrath on the earth.”
66016002 The first angel went and poured out his bowl on the land, and ugly, festering sores broke out on the people who had the mark of the beast and worshiped its image.
66016003 The second angel poured out his bowl on the sea, and it turned into blood like that of a dead person, and every living thing in the sea died.
66016004 The third angel poured out his bowl on the rivers and springs of water, and they became blood.
66016005 Then I heard the angel in charge of the waters say: “You are just in these judgments, O Holy One, you who are and who were;
66016006 for they have shed the blood of your holy people and your prophets, and you have given them blood to drink as they deserve.”
66016007 And I heard the altar respond: “Yes, Lord God Almighty, true and just are your judgments.”
66016008 The fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun, and the sun was allowed to scorch people with fire.
66016009 They were seared by the intense heat and they cursed the name of God, who had control over these plagues, but they refused to repent and glorify him.
66016010 The fifth angel poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast, and its kingdom was plunged into darkness. People gnawed their tongues in agony
66016011 and cursed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, but they refused to repent of what they had done.
66016012 The sixth angel poured out his bowl on the great river Euphrates, and its water was dried up to prepare the way for the kings from the East.
66016013 Then I saw three impure spirits that looked like frogs; they came out of the mouth of the dragon, out of the mouth of the beast and out of the mouth of the false prophet.
66016014 They are demonic spirits that perform signs, and they go out to the kings of the whole world, to gather them for the battle on the great day of God Almighty.
66016015 “Look, I come like a thief! Blessed is the one who stays awake and remains clothed, so as not to go naked and be shamefully exposed.”
66016016 Then they gathered the kings together to the place that in Hebrew is called Armageddon.
66016017 The seventh angel poured out his bowl into the air, and out of the temple came a loud voice from the throne, saying, “It is done!”
66016018 Then there came flashes of lightning, rumblings, peals of thunder and a severe earthquake. No earthquake like it has ever occurred since mankind has been on earth, so tremendous was the quake.
66016019 The great city split into three parts, and the cities of the nations collapsed. God remembered Babylon the Great and gave her the cup filled with the wine of the fury of his wrath.
66016020 Every island fled away and the mountains could not be found.
66016021 From the sky huge hailstones, each weighing about a hundred pounds, fell on people. And they cursed God on account of the plague of hail, because the plague was so terrible.
66017001 One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and said to me, “Come, I will show you the punishment of the great prostitute, who sits by many waters.
66017002 With her the kings of the earth committed adultery, and the inhabitants of the earth were intoxicated with the wine of her adulteries.”
66017003 Then the angel carried me away in the Spirit into a wilderness. There I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast that was covered with blasphemous names and had seven heads and ten horns.
66017004 The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, and was glittering with gold, precious stones and pearls. She held a golden cup in her hand, filled with abominable things and the filth of her adulteries.
66017005 The name written on her forehead was a mystery: babylon the great the mother of prostitutes and of the abominations of the earth.
66017006 I saw that the woman was drunk with the blood of God’s holy people, the blood of those who bore testimony to Jesus. When I saw her, I was greatly astonished.
66017007 Then the angel said to me: “Why are you astonished? I will explain to you the mystery of the woman and of the beast she rides, which has the seven heads and ten horns.
66017008 The beast, which you saw, once was, now is not, and yet will come up out of the Abyss and go to its destruction. The inhabitants of the earth whose names have not been written in the book of life from the creation of the world will be astonished when they see the beast, because it once was, now is not, and yet will come.
66017009 “This calls for a mind with wisdom. The seven heads are seven hills on which the woman sits.
66017010 They are also seven kings. Five have fallen, one is, the other has not yet come; but when he does come, he must remain for only a little while.
66017011 The beast who once was, and now is not, is an eighth king. He belongs to the seven and is going to his destruction.
66017012 “The ten horns you saw are ten kings who have not yet received a kingdom, but who for one hour will receive authority as kings along with the beast.
66017013 They have one purpose and will give their power and authority to the beast.
66017014 They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will triumph over them because he is Lord of lords and King of kings—and with him will be his called, chosen and faithful followers.”
66017015 Then the angel said to me, “The waters you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations and languages.
66017016 The beast and the ten horns you saw will hate the prostitute. They will bring her to ruin and leave her naked; they will eat her flesh and burn her with fire.
66017017 For God has put it into their hearts to accomplish his purpose by agreeing to hand over to the beast their royal authority, until God’s words are fulfilled.
66017018 The woman you saw is the great city that rules over the kings of the earth.”
66018001 After this I saw another angel coming down from heaven. He had great authority, and the earth was illuminated by his splendor.
66018002 With a mighty voice he shouted: “ ‘Fallen! Fallen is Babylon the Great!’ She has become a dwelling for demons and a haunt for every impure spirit, a haunt for every unclean bird, a haunt for every unclean and detestable animal.
66018003 For all the nations have drunk the maddening wine of her adulteries. The kings of the earth committed adultery with her, and the merchants of the earth grew rich from her excessive luxuries.”
66018004 Then I heard another voice from heaven say: “ ‘Come out of her, my people,’ so that you will not share in her sins, so that you will not receive any of her plagues;
66018005 for her sins are piled up to heaven, and God has remembered her crimes.
66018006 Give back to her as she has given; pay her back double for what she has done. Pour her a double portion from her own cup.
66018007 Give her as much torment and grief as the glory and luxury she gave herself. In her heart she boasts, ‘I sit enthroned as queen. I am not a widow; I will never mourn.’
66018008 Therefore in one day her plagues will overtake her: death, mourning and famine. She will be consumed by fire, for mighty is the Lord God who judges her.
66018009 “When the kings of the earth who committed adultery with her and shared her luxury see the smoke of her burning, they will weep and mourn over her.
66018010 Terrified at her torment, they will stand far off and cry: “ ‘Woe! Woe to you, great city, you mighty city of Babylon! In one hour your doom has come!’
66018011 “The merchants of the earth will weep and mourn over her because no one buys their cargoes anymore—
66018012 cargoes of gold, silver, precious stones and pearls; fine linen, purple, silk and scarlet cloth; every sort of citron wood, and articles of every kind made of ivory, costly wood, bronze, iron and marble;
66018013 cargoes of cinnamon and spice, of incense, myrrh and frankincense, of wine and olive oil, of fine flour and wheat; cattle and sheep; horses and carriages; and human beings sold as slaves.
66018014 “They will say, ‘The fruit you longed for is gone from you. All your luxury and splendor have vanished, never to be recovered.’
66018015 The merchants who sold these things and gained their wealth from her will stand far off, terrified at her torment. They will weep and mourn
66018016 and cry out: “ ‘Woe! Woe to you, great city, dressed in fine linen, purple and scarlet, and glittering with gold, precious stones and pearls!
66018017 In one hour such great wealth has been brought to ruin!’ “Every sea captain, and all who travel by ship, the sailors, and all who earn their living from the sea, will stand far off.
66018018 When they see the smoke of her burning, they will exclaim, ‘Was there ever a city like this great city?’
66018019 They will throw dust on their heads, and with weeping and mourning cry out: “ ‘Woe! Woe to you, great city, where all who had ships on the sea became rich through her wealth! In one hour she has been brought to ruin!’
66018020 “Rejoice over her, you heavens! Rejoice, you people of God! Rejoice, apostles and prophets! For God has judged her with the judgment she imposed on you.”
66018021 Then a mighty angel picked up a boulder the size of a large millstone and threw it into the sea, and said: “With such violence the great city of Babylon will be thrown down, never to be found again.
66018022 The music of harpists and musicians, pipers and trumpeters, will never be heard in you again. No worker of any trade will ever be found in you again. The sound of a millstone will never be heard in you again.
66018023 The light of a lamp will never shine in you again. The voice of bridegroom and bride will never be heard in you again. Your merchants were the world’s important people. By your magic spell all the nations were led astray.
66018024 In her was found the blood of prophets and of God’s holy people, of all who have been slaughtered on the earth.”
66019001 After this I heard what sounded like the roar of a great multitude in heaven shouting: “Hallelujah! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God,
66019002 for true and just are his judgments. He has condemned the great prostitute who corrupted the earth by her adulteries. He has avenged on her the blood of his servants.”
66019003 And again they shouted: “Hallelujah! The smoke from her goes up for ever and ever.”
66019004 The twenty-four elders and the four living creatures fell down and worshiped God, who was seated on the throne. And they cried: “Amen, Hallelujah!”
66019005 Then a voice came from the throne, saying: “Praise our God, all you his servants, you who fear him, both great and small!”
66019006 Then I heard what sounded like a great multitude, like the roar of rushing waters and like loud peals of thunder, shouting: “Hallelujah! For our Lord God Almighty reigns.
66019007 Let us rejoice and be glad and give him glory! For the wedding of the Lamb has come, and his bride has made herself ready.
66019008 Fine linen, bright and clean, was given her to wear.” (Fine linen stands for the righteous acts of God’s holy people.)
66019009 Then the angel said to me, “Write this: Blessed are those who are invited to the wedding supper of the Lamb!” And he added, “These are the true words of God.”
66019010 At this I fell at his feet to worship him. But he said to me, “Don’t do that! I am a fellow servant with you and with your brothers and sisters who hold to the testimony of Jesus. Worship God! For it is the Spirit of prophecy who bears testimony to Jesus.”
66019011 I saw heaven standing open and there before me was a white horse, whose rider is called Faithful and True. With justice he judges and wages war.
66019012 His eyes are like blazing fire, and on his head are many crowns. He has a name written on him that no one knows but he himself.
66019013 He is dressed in a robe dipped in blood, and his name is the Word of God.
66019014 The armies of heaven were following him, riding on white horses and dressed in fine linen, white and clean.
66019015 Coming out of his mouth is a sharp sword with which to strike down the nations. “He will rule them with an iron scepter.” He treads the winepress of the fury of the wrath of God Almighty.
66019016 On his robe and on his thigh he has this name written: king of kings and lord of lords.
66019017 And I saw an angel standing in the sun, who cried in a loud voice to all the birds flying in midair, “Come, gather together for the great supper of God,
66019018 so that you may eat the flesh of kings, generals, and the mighty, of horses and their riders, and the flesh of all people, free and slave, great and small.”
66019019 Then I saw the beast and the kings of the earth and their armies gathered together to wage war against the rider on the horse and his army.
66019020 But the beast was captured, and with it the false prophet who had performed the signs on its behalf. With these signs he had deluded those who had received the mark of the beast and worshiped its image. The two of them were thrown alive into the fiery lake of burning sulfur.
66019021 The rest were killed with the sword coming out of the mouth of the rider on the horse, and all the birds gorged themselves on their flesh.
66020001 And I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key to the Abyss and holding in his hand a great chain.
66020002 He seized the dragon, that ancient serpent, who is the devil, or Satan, and bound him for a thousand years.
66020003 He threw him into the Abyss, and locked and sealed it over him, to keep him from deceiving the nations anymore until the thousand years were ended. After that, he must be set free for a short time.
66020004 I saw thrones on which were seated those who had been given authority to judge. And I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded because of their testimony about Jesus and because of the word of God. They had not worshiped the beast or its image and had not received its mark on their foreheads or their hands. They came to life and reigned with Christ a thousand years.
66020005 (The rest of the dead did not come to life until the thousand years were ended.) This is the first resurrection.
66020006 Blessed and holy are those who share in the first resurrection. The second death has no power over them, but they will be priests of God and of Christ and will reign with him for a thousand years.
66020007 When the thousand years are over, Satan will be released from his prison
66020008 and will go out to deceive the nations in the four corners of the earth—Gog and Magog—and to gather them for battle. In number they are like the sand on the seashore.
66020009 They marched across the breadth of the earth and surrounded the camp of God’s people, the city he loves. But fire came down from heaven and devoured them.
66020010 And the devil, who deceived them, was thrown into the lake of burning sulfur, where the beast and the false prophet had been thrown. They will be tormented day and night for ever and ever.
66020011 Then I saw a great white throne and him who was seated on it. The earth and the heavens fled from his presence, and there was no place for them.
66020012 And I saw the dead, great and small, standing before the throne, and books were opened. Another book was opened, which is the book of life. The dead were judged according to what they had done as recorded in the books.
66020013 The sea gave up the dead that were in it, and death and Hades gave up the dead that were in them, and each person was judged according to what they had done.
66020014 Then death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire. The lake of fire is the second death.
66020015 Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.
66021001 Then I saw “a new heaven and a new earth,” for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and there was no longer any sea.
66021002 I saw the Holy City, the new Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, prepared as a bride beautifully dressed for her husband.
66021003 And I heard a loud voice from the throne saying, “Look! God’s dwelling place is now among the people, and he will dwell with them. They will be his people, and God himself will be with them and be their God.
66021004 ‘He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death’ or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.”
66021005 He who was seated on the throne said, “I am making everything new!” Then he said, “Write this down, for these words are trustworthy and true.”
66021006 He said to me: “It is done. I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End. To the thirsty I will give water without cost from the spring of the water of life.
66021007 Those who are victorious will inherit all this, and I will be their God and they will be my children.
66021008 But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars—they will be consigned to the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death.”
66021009 One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven last plagues came and said to me, “Come, I will show you the bride, the wife of the Lamb.”
66021010 And he carried me away in the Spirit to a mountain great and high, and showed me the Holy City, Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God.
66021011 It shone with the glory of God, and its brilliance was like that of a very precious jewel, like a jasper, clear as crystal.
66021012 It had a great, high wall with twelve gates, and with twelve angels at the gates. On the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of Israel.
66021013 There were three gates on the east, three on the north, three on the south and three on the west.
66021014 The wall of the city had twelve foundations, and on them were the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.
66021015 The angel who talked with me had a measuring rod of gold to measure the city, its gates and its walls.
66021016 The city was laid out like a square, as long as it was wide. He measured the city with the rod and found it to be 12,000 stadia in length, and as wide and high as it is long.
66021017 The angel measured the wall using human measurement, and it was 144 cubits thick.
66021018 The wall was made of jasper, and the city of pure gold, as pure as glass.
66021019 The foundations of the city walls were decorated with every kind of precious stone. The first foundation was jasper, the second sapphire, the third agate, the fourth emerald,
66021020 the fifth onyx, the sixth ruby, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth turquoise, the eleventh jacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.
66021021 The twelve gates were twelve pearls, each gate made of a single pearl. The great street of the city was of gold, as pure as transparent glass.
66021022 I did not see a temple in the city, because the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are its temple.
66021023 The city does not need the sun or the moon to shine on it, for the glory of God gives it light, and the Lamb is its lamp.
66021024 The nations will walk by its light, and the kings of the earth will bring their splendor into it.
66021025 On no day will its gates ever be shut, for there will be no night there.
66021026 The glory and honor of the nations will be brought into it.
66021027 Nothing impure will ever enter it, nor will anyone who does what is shameful or deceitful, but only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life.
66022001 Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life, as clear as crystal, flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb
66022002 down the middle of the great street of the city. On each side of the river stood the tree of life, bearing twelve crops of fruit, yielding its fruit every month. And the leaves of the tree are for the healing of the nations.
66022003 No longer will there be any curse. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in the city, and his servants will serve him.
66022004 They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.
66022005 There will be no more night. They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun, for the Lord God will give them light. And they will reign for ever and ever.
66022006 The angel said to me, “These words are trustworthy and true. The Lord, the God who inspires the prophets, sent his angel to show his servants the things that must soon take place.”
66022007 “Look, I am coming soon! Blessed is the one who keeps the words of the prophecy written in this scroll.”
66022008 I, John, am the one who heard and saw these things. And when I had heard and seen them, I fell down to worship at the feet of the angel who had been showing them to me.
66022009 But he said to me, “Don’t do that! I am a fellow servant with you and with your fellow prophets and with all who keep the words of this scroll. Worship God!”
66022010 Then he told me, “Do not seal up the words of the prophecy of this scroll, because the time is near.
66022011 Let the one who does wrong continue to do wrong; let the vile person continue to be vile; let the one who does right continue to do right; and let the holy person continue to be holy.”
66022012 “Look, I am coming soon! My reward is with me, and I will give to each person according to what they have done.
66022013 I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
66022014 “Blessed are those who wash their robes, that they may have the right to the tree of life and may go through the gates into the city.
66022015 Outside are the dogs, those who practice magic arts, the sexually immoral, the murderers, the idolaters and everyone who loves and practices falsehood.
66022016 “I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches. I am the Root and the Offspring of David, and the bright Morning Star.”
66022017 The Spirit and the bride say, “Come!” And let the one who hears say, “Come!” Let the one who is thirsty come; and let the one who wishes take the free gift of the water of life.
66022018 I warn everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this scroll: If anyone adds anything to them, God will add to that person the plagues described in this scroll.
66022019 And if anyone takes words away from this scroll of prophecy, God will take away from that person any share in the tree of life and in the Holy City, which are described in this scroll.
66022020 He who testifies to these things says, “Yes, I am coming soon.” Amen. Come, Lord Jesus.
66022021 The grace of the Lord Jesus be with God’s people. Amen.
